trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ListItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ListItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The string, "RibbonGalleryItem".
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres, "RibbonGalleryItem".

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automation peer for the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o par de automação para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> pai.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer for the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação para o pai <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: Rola pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> para exibir o controle dentro da região visível (visor) do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Essa API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> que é associada a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> selecionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> from the collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> da coleção de itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Deselects any selected items and then selects the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Anula a seleção de todos os itens selecionados e, em seguida, seleciona o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automation peer that acts as the container for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o par de automação que atua como o contêiner para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that acts as the container for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação que atua como contêiner para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>.
